title: Nord on President Bush
author: VD
content_html:
Jay Nordlinger writes on NRO:

I have said it before, friends, and will remind you again: There will never be another like him. Enjoy it while you can.

In light of my column today, I found myself wondering if that is a threat or a promise?
content_text:
